  3. WeekdayJp å‹ã®å€¤ãŒ Sunday ã€œ Saturday ä»¥å¤–ãªã‚‰ï¼Œæ›œæ—¥åã®å‡ºåŠ›ã¯ time.Weekday.String() ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã¨åŒã˜ã«ã—ãŸã„

ã¨ã„ã†ã‚ã‘ã§ï¼Œæœ€çµ‚çš„ã«ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«ã—ãŸã€‚

// WeekdayJp is a type that represents the days of the week in the Japanese context.
// It is based on the time.Weekday type from the standard library.
type WeekdayJp time.Weekday

const (
    Sunday    WeekdayJp = WeekdayJp(time.Sunday) + iota // æ—¥æ›œæ—¥
    Monday                                              // æœˆæ›œæ—¥
    Tuesday                                             // ç«æ›œæ—¥
    Wednesday                                           // æ°´æ›œæ—¥
    Thursday                                            // æœ¨æ›œæ—¥
    Friday                                              // é‡‘æ›œæ—¥
    Saturday                                            // åœŸæ›œæ—¥
)

var weekdayNames = [7]string{"æ—¥æ›œæ—¥", "æœˆæ›œæ—¥", "ç«æ›œæ—¥", "æ°´æ›œæ—¥", "æœ¨æ›œæ—¥", "é‡‘æ›œæ—¥", "åœŸæ›œæ—¥"}
var weekdayShortNames = [7]string{"æ—¥", "æœˆ", "ç«", "æ°´", "æœ¨", "é‡‘", "åœŸ"}

// String returns the English name of the Japanese weekday (WeekdayJp)
// by converting it to the standard time.Weekday type and calling its String method.
func (w WeekdayJp) String() string {
    return time.Weekday(w).String()
}

// StringJp returns the Japanese name of the WeekdayJp if it is between Sunday and Saturday.
// If the WeekdayJp is out of this range, it returns the standard time.Weekday string representation.
func (w WeekdayJp) StringJp() string {
    if w < Sunday || w > Saturday {
        return time.Weekday(w).String()
    }
    return weekdayNames[w]
}

// ShortStringJp returns the short Japanese name of the WeekdayJp.
// If the WeekdayJp is not within the valid range (Sunday to Saturday),
// it returns the default string representation of the time.Weekday.
func (w WeekdayJp) ShortStringJp() string {
    if w < Sunday || w > Saturday {
        return time.Weekday(w).String()
    }
    return weekdayShortNames[w]
}

æ—¥æœ¬ã®æš¦æƒ…å ±ã¯å›½ç«‹å¤©æ–‡å°ã®æš¦è¨ˆç®—å®¤ã§è¦‹ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã€‚ ã“ã®ä¸­ã®ã€Œä»Šæœˆã®ã“ã‚ˆã¿ powered by Google Calendarã€ã§ Google Calendar ã¨é€£æºã•ã›ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã®ã ãŒï¼Œã“ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ãŸ github.com/goark/koyomi ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’å…¬é–‹ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«ä½¿ãˆã‚‹ã€‚

package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/koyomi"
    "github.com/goark/koyomi/value"
)

func main() {
    start, _ := value.DateFrom("2026-01-01")
    end, _ := value.DateFrom("2026-12-31")
    td, err := os.MkdirTemp(os.TempDir(), "blog")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer func() { _ = os.RemoveAll(td) }()
    k, err := koyomi.NewSource(
        koyomi.WithCalendarID(koyomi.Holiday),
        koyomi.WithStartDate(start),
        koyomi.WithEndDate(end),
        koyomi.WithTempDir(td),
    ).Get()
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }

    fmt.Println("| æ—¥ä»˜ | æ›œæ—¥ | å†…å®¹ |")
    fmt.Println("| ---- |:----:| ---- |")
    for _, e := range k.Events() {
        fmt.Printf("| %v | %v | %v |\n", e.Date.StringJp(), e.Date.WeekdayJp().ShortStringJp(), e.Title)
    }
}
